description: Technical coding standards and best practices
rules: No 'any' in TypeScript - use proper types
Trailing whitespace detected - use automated formatting
Mixed tabs and spaces - use consistent formatting
Avoid wildcard imports - use specific imports
Proper error handling with try-catch blocks and meaningful messages
Use context managers (with statement) for file operations
No secrets in code; use environment variables and secure storage
Secure authentication implementation with proper validation
Protect sensitive data with encryption and access controls
Validate and sanitize all user inputs
Sanitize outputs to prevent injection attacks
Async only for handlers; avoid blocking calls; httpx for async tests
pip-tools lock with hashes; no unpinned deps
